title: #254: Breaking Down Tiger King with Barbara Fisher, Part 6
description:
We are joined one last time by tiger trainer Barbara Fisher who appeared in the Netflix show 'Tiger King.' Barbara provides insight about what was really going on behind the scenes.


#CoerciveControl

#TigerKing
